pullRequest.title: [CDAP-16885] Support the live Configuration Groups view (plugin JSON Creator)
pullRequest.bodyText:
JIRA: https://issues.cask.co/browse/CDAP-16885
Currently, users are able to see their live progress in editing the plugin JSON file by looking at their JSON output.
This PR implements an additional feature where users can view their live progress through existing ConfigurationGroups component. Our system will allow users to see how their widgets actually look like. Now, users are able to toggle between JSON View and Configuration Groups View.
Things to note:
When we import a file of relatively bigger size, the inputs tend to be a bit more laggy. I'm planning to make a separate PR that addresses this optimization issue.
Configuration Groups View
